blocks.name: dfdec100
blocks.content: Split the hundreds from a decimal value. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfdec100(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdc(c1, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
} = {
  3eqtr2ri(cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdc(c1, c2)), co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2)), co(co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1)), caddc, c2))
  oveq2i(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
  dfdec10(c1, c2)
  addassi(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), c2)
  mulcli(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), c0)
  eqeltrri(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mulcli(cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mulcli(cdc(nat1, nat0), c1)
  recni(c2)
  eqtr2i(co(co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1)), caddc, c2), cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(c0, c1)), caddc, c2))
  dfdec10(cdc(c0, c1), c2)
  oveq1i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(c0, c1)), caddc, c2, co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1)))
  3eqtri(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(c0, c1)), co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1)), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1)), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0)), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1)))
  oveq2i(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(c0, c1), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1))
  dfdec10(c0, c1)
  adddii(cdc(nat1, nat0), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), c1)
  mulcli(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0)
  nn0cni(c1)
  oveq1i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0)), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0))
  eqtr3i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0)), co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, c0))
  mulassi(cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(nat1, nat0), c0)
  nn0cni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nn0cni(c0)
  oveq1i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, c0, cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  dec0u(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn0()
}
